title: Personal Research Topics
text:
Finance:

Quantitative investment strategies Researching and documenting various data-driven investment strategies for major asset classes.  
Tactical asset allocation using derivatives Investigating investment strategies for tactical asset allocations using derivatives to systematically hedge emerging large tail risks.  

Data Science:

Unified Python data science framework for credit decisioning Documenting and analysing requirements for a standardised/unified data science framework to help with the majority of modelling carried out by credit data scientist/analysts using Python.  

Economics:

Government as a last resort universal lender for the economy Exploring the potential for a government-backed lender of last resort for consumers and businesses, following a number of UK government programs to support the commercial lending acitivities to businesses (covid loans, energy prices support) and consumers (student loans, energy subsidies).

title: Consulting
text:
Here are some of the assignments I have successfully completed for different teams in the financial space:

Capital Markets




Interest rates trading desk






Automated data collection of market information from a number of exchanges.


Subseqeuent data cleaning, transformation and standartisation to enable interactive data visualisation and exploration.


Basic machine learning model to price interest rate derivatives, based on historic market information.








Large asset owner






Analysis of portfolio managers’ historic performance for a number of asset classes.


Identification of return anomalies and style drifts, using machine learning classification algorithms.








Short only hedge fund






Analysis of news articles on the internet, classification and aggregation of adverse news stories for further detailed analysis by fund’s analysts.


Extraction of information in the text and subsequent visualisation of related articles, as a knowledge graph.








Venture capital fund for AI startups






European Machine Intelligence Landscape data analytics project on the funding statistics for AI first startups in Europe.


Data scraping of startup funding information from various online sources.


Data processing and storage in Google Sheets to enable manual editing by non-technical maintainers.


Data analytics and subsequent interactive visualisation of overall market trends using D3.js.








Financial Services




Challenger Bank






Development of an internal full stack financial analytics software applications.


Introduction of frameworks and tooling to support future development of analytical web applications on on-prem Windows Servers infrastructure.








BNPL fintech lender






Development of the credit lending strategy for new BNPL proposition among fintech’s existing customer base.


Quantitification of portfolio risks and customer segmentation, using existing customers’ historic purchasing data and app usage behaviour.








Crossborder money transfers






Modelling and forecasting total user activity and its impact on revenue / costs.


Breakdown of usage into a number of metrics/KPIs to enable better business optimisation and monitoring.








My day rate starts from £800 (outside IR35 or equivalent) - depending on the quantum / type of work.


I can guarantee a quick turnaround and high quality of work exceeding your expectations.


Feel free to organise an introductionary call  with me to discuss your requirements.

title: Projects
text:
RCFtech - Debt facility as a service for fintech credit lenders
    
    
    
    
    Amidst the global fintech downturn of summer 2022, I attempted to launch a credit facility proposition to fund fintech lenders on incremental "pay as you go basis" with a subscription business model, using data analytics for risk management.
    
        Pitched leading VCs in the UK and USA, private credit investors and startup fintechs in London.
        Selection and intergration with a number of "banking as as service" and data providers.
        Built first product prototype using Django/Flask web frameworks and batch data processes.
        Creation of API schemas, documentation and guides for clients and partners.
    
    Partner Deck
    
    
    
    
    
    
    tplusn.io - Automated time series forecasting as a service
    
    
    
    
    Developed a cloud based prototype AutoML solution for time series forecasting and scenario modelling to help with business planning and decision making with a web and API interfaces.
    
        Large data processing problem requiring high performance for speed.
        Intergration of 10+ machine learning models and frameworks.
        Used Django REST framework to develop APIs for data requests.
        Dynamic chart visualisation on the front end using Chart.js
        Integration with Stripe for subscription billing.
    
    Product Deck
    
    
    
    
    
    
    RiskTails - Understand your counterparty credit risk
    
    
    
    
    Quantitification of credit risk for B2B companies to help with credit control and reducing working capital.
    
        Built first credit risk scoring model using Companies House data.
        Used Flask to develop the website and for integration with Companies House APIs.
        Created interactive visualisations of different risk factors using Chart.js.
    
    Prototype Demo
    
    
    
    
    
    
    Perept – information recommender system for education and learning materials
    
    
    
    
    Developed personalised recommendation system for text-based information stored as a knowledge graph for each user.
    
        Using various NLP frameworks to process qualitative data and create knowledge graphs.
        Development of machine learning models for the recommendation system.
        Built interactive front end for users in React with Flask APIs on the back end.
        Participated in 2 startup accelerator programs.
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
    
    Founders Time - content creation on AI startups and their founders.
    
    
    
    
    Created content on London's AI startups and founders and organised a number of founder panels.
    
        Interviewed a number of successful startup founders at pre-seed/seed stage.
        Formed partnerships with VCs, startups, non-profits for events and promotions.
        Growth hacking social media to grow reach in London and online in general.
    
    Blog Article
    
    
    
    
    
    
    MenuHub - a digital platform of restaurant menus for individuals with food allergies
    
    
    
    
    Together with a co-founder built an interactive discovery platform for restaurant menus, catered towards individuals with food allergies.
    
        Developed a number of scrapers and document processing applications for automated information extraction.
        Direct intergration with an online food delivery service using a bot, instead of APIs, to enable a full user flow from search to order placement.
    
    Product Screenshot
    
    
    
    
    
    
    YARPN - Young Anglo-Russian Professionals Network in London
    
    
    
    
    Launced a monthly informal networking events in Central London for Russian speaking professionals.
    
        Developed commercial partnerhips with a number of venues and companies to fund various community events and activities.
        Developed an online membership website using WordPress to generate additional income.
        Aggresive growth hacking techniques on social media (LinkedIn and Instagram) to grow membership base up to 1,000 members.
        Succesfully handed over the project to another person to allow myself space to focus on other projects (YARPN is still active and thriving).
    
    Instagram Photo

title: Welcome!
text:
I specialise in applying data science techniques to quantify risks in the financial domain space.
I work with a range of companies in the traditional financial services sector and with innovative fintech / data analytics startups to solve their most challenging analytical problems.  


Benefit from my knowledge and experiences through my contracting / consulting services.


Learn about a spectrum of personal projects I’ve previously worked on.


Organise an introductionary call  with me to discuss your requirements or just to meet.



Website last updated: April 2023

title: My Professional Experiences and Education
text:
I am a quantitative analyst / data scientist in the financial / economics domain space. Most of my analytical work is done using Python and its large number of supporting libraries / frameworks.
I work both with technology / quant teams on sophisticated tech / data / analytics projects and non-technical sales/management teams, as well as consulting / supporting business’ end users / clients.
I have a broad range of experiences and knowledge developed during my professional employment and through personal projects.
